content.title: Aortic Dissection Recognition
content.statement: Aortic Dissection Recognition is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Emergency-Medicine that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Aortic Dissection Recognition helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Aortic Dissection Recognition include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Aortic Dissection Recognition.

citations.source: UpToDate. (2024). Aortic Dissection Recognition. Wolters Kluwer.
Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
